title: Video Utilization Strategies for Online Mathematics Learning: Quiz-Based Accountability-Enhanced Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: VR simulation-based training for in-service professionals focusing on enhancing problem-solving skills through applied mathematical concepts

learning_goals: Learners can fully watch at least 80% of a 6-minute IMV video and achieve a quiz accuracy rate of over 90%.
Learners can apply mathematical concepts presented in video content to a VR simulation environment with over 70% accuracy.
Learners can demonstrate content comprehension by scoring an average of 90+ points on formative assessments after video-based learning.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
